text: V. J. Chitra (2 May 1992 â€“ 9 December 2020) was an Indian actress, model and news anchor. She was born in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. Chitra began her career in 2013. She was best known for her roles as Vishali in Mannan Magal, Periya in Chinna Papa Periya Papa, Mullai in Pandian Stores and as Anitha in Darling Darling. Chitra died on 9 December 2020 after hanging herself at her apartment in Chennai, aged 28. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian movie actors Category:Television news anchors Category:Actors from Chennai Category:Indian models Category:Suicides by hanging
title: V. J. Chitra
